titles: A sparing discouerie of our English Iesuits, and of Fa. Parsons proceedings vnder pretence of promoting the Catholike faith in England for a caueat to all true Catholiks our very louing brethren and friends, how they embrace such very vncatholike, though Iesuiticall deseignments.
author: Bagshaw, Christopher, d. 1625?
Watson, William, 1559?-1603.
notes: Editor's preface signed: W.W., i.e. William Watson.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "Aj"; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
